alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 4:20PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN LANCASTER COUNTY THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 420 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Holland, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Ephrata, New Holland, Terre Hill, Churchtown, Bareville, Bowmansville, Intercourse, Fivepointville, Blue Ball, Farmersville and Goodville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for south central Pennsylvania.
